comments.text:
Bug 475045 added the option to drag selected non-linkified text urls to the bookmark toolbar. However, lots of websites don't include the protocol when it's a regular website (a la google search). It would be very convenient if this feature could be extended to support that as well.
this is similar to Bug 515512 extending Bug 454518
